quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易将"out-"误解为"去除"而误判为"使停止发光"，或混淆"outshine"与"stand out"的含义（仅突出而非更出色）
quiz_item.sentence: In the talent show, Sarah's singing **outshone** all the other performers, making her the clear winner.

option.definition: to be much better or more impressive than others
to cause something to stop shining
to stand out by being the tallest
to shine brightly in the open air
